CustomField.description:
"Definition: Specifies the initial/primary type of channel that will be used to communicate the campaign to the member and if applicable collect their opt-in.
Options Below: Meter Message: the selected audience will recieve an invite to opt-in from their BG meter during the eligible period No Notifciation: Definition: A campaign with ""No Notification"" selected will not send an opt-in invitation to members via the BG meter."
Data Owner: Program Management Team
CustomField.label: Notification Type
